# IDL codes library

(description...)

## califa
Codes used for the analysis of the SN host galaxies observed by CALIFA with Integral Field Spectroscopy, presented in Galbany et al. (2014), A&A, and Galbany et al. (in prep.).

arXiv:  http://arxiv.org/abs/1409.1623

ADSABS: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2014A%26A...572A..38G

arXiv:  http://

ADSABS: http://

## cats
Codes used for the analysis of 51 SN II light-curves presented in Galbany et al. (2016), AJ.

arXiv:  http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.08402

ADSABS: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/bib_query?arXiv:1511.08402

## muse
Codes used for the AMUSING pilot study with MUSE science Verification data in Galbany et al. (2016), MNRAS.

arXiv:  http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.01495

ADSABS: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/bib_query?arXiv:1511.01495

## sn14j

Codes used for the spectroscopic charaterisation of SN 2014J wit INT and WHT spectra presented in Galbany et al. (2016), MNRAS.

arXiv:  http://arxiv.org/abs/1510.06596

ADSABS: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/bib_query?arXiv:1510.06596

## others 
Other useful codes downloaded from the net
